text: School bullying is when kids in school bully other Studies show that school bullying happens to some more than others, particularly young people with disabilities "Briefing Paper, 'Bullying and Students with Disabilities'," National Council on Disability, 2010; retrieved 2013-2-20. and those with sexual orientation that are not traditional. "For Most Bullied Gay Kids, Things Do 'Get Better,' Study Finds" at nlm.nih.gov, February 4, 2013; retrieved 2013-2-20. ==References== ==Other websites== * ”Bullying Widespread in U.S. Schools, Study Finds” at nichd.nih.gov Category:Bullying Category:Childhood
title: School bullying
